name: ZIP File Format, Version 6.3.3 (PKWARE)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">zip, ZIP</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: 2012 version (based on APPNOTE.TXT Version 6.3.3) of de facto industry standard for cross-platform data exchange.  Technically identical to ZIP as defined in APPNOTE.TXT 6.3.2 published in September 2007.
